title: Effects of Lee Silverman Voice Treatment
abstract: This review aims to examine the effects of Lee Silverman Voice Treatment PsycINFO, PubMed, EMBASE, SCOPUS, PEDro, CINAHL, and Web of Science were searched until June 2025. Studies were included if they included patients with PD, administered LSVT Ten studies (300 participants) met the inclusion criteria. No significant effects in the Time-Up & Go (TUG) test (SMD: 0.050, 95% CI: -0.550 to 0.650,  The initial findings revealed that LSVT Lee Silverman Voice Treatment
